name: Ad Extremum
description:
Hello we made a game for the jam woooo

by me(lydia) @lydcity and marzena(@estrogenaddict)

you're a big spooky witch whos done with things and wants to bring about the end of the world

click on things; drag structures from yr inventory into the world

 getting 3 shiny star things is symbolically the end of the world (in this build) (use your imagination)
we made literally everything except for the font

the exit button is located at alt + f4 (we didnt make an exit button or a menu sorry)
